guide: You can get easy contribution for
this by breaking some Wheat in the Hub.
If you want faster contribution,
make a Sugar Cane farm in your Garden.
Recommended for this is to fish in the
Backwater Bayou with the best rod you have
access to and full Angler Set or better.
To get easy progress in this do
contests like Wheat, Potato
or Carrot as those are easy
Bronze or Silver Medals to get.
You can also try to utilize pests to help here.
You should use SkyHanni's Trapper features
to make this easier. Use /warp trapper
to get back to Trevor whenever you want.
You will need a bow for this.
For this pretty much all ores count, just
things like Cobblestone/Stone don't. For faster
progress here you'll want to use as much
Mining Speed and Spread as possible
and pair it with the Pickobulus
pickaxe ability that unlocks at HotM 3.
Look for mobs with a purple name
and kill it.
Craft some easy minions while also getting
those that will help with this Bingo.
Use NPC shops to buy materials for easy crafts.
You can find Relic Coordinates in Skytils
or the Wiki. Some of them will require
the use of some Ender Pearls.
Kill Spiders in the Spider's Den (/warp spider)
place a few Spider Minions and participate
in killing Arachne in Arachne's Sanctuary.
Recommended to wear a Cow Head to avoid the poison.
For the Minions, dont forget to give them the best
fuel and storage you have access to. Collect in time!
The easiest solution for this is the Jerry pet.
To get the Enchanted Egg needed, kill Chickens
in The Barn till you get the Chicken Head recipe.
Once you get your first Enchanted Egg, use it
to craft your pet.
Complete a Floor 1 with a score of 230+
and buy the chest afterwards. If you can't buy
immediately, either save money and buy it from
Croesus within the next 2 days or do another run.
You will probably need help with this.
Optimal tool:
Golden Axe with Efficiency 5
Reforges: Double-Bit or Lush
Get Haste 3 from a splash to instamine wood
Forage in the Hub for this.
Place as many minions as you can
give them a medium storage and the best fuel
you can. Collect them in time.

note: Kill a t2 Slayer Boss under 80s
guide: Recommended for this either Revenant Horror II
or Tarantula Broodfather II. Use your Ender Armor
and Void Sword (200k) for this.
You will most likely be able to complete this
from doing the Emerald Treasure Goal as there
is a high chance for a t6 Enchanted Book to be
in the given Reward Chests.
The easiest solution here would be
to craft a Wheat Minion t11 (83.232 Wheat).
Utilize the Garden and its pests
to obtain the needed resources.
Brew an Absorption IV potion with an
Enchanted Gold and combine it with a Glowstone.
You can get that Glowstone by buying one block
from the Builder and breaking it on your island.
Start an Entrance floor and
play Mage/Tank/Berserker to use
their abilities to kill a Lost Adventurer.
You only need to get the last hit,
so you can get help from your team.
You need Combat Level 15 for this.
Do your daily commissions in the Dwarven Mines
(4 per day). You will need Mining 12 for this.
Can also be completed in the Crystal Hollows,
though it might be harder to do so.
To help with this, try to make bigger crafts
by hand for Carpentry levels.
Use the Enchanted Sugar that you may get from
pests/the Garden to brew Speed Potions.
Also do your daily experiments and make sure
to have a pet active at all times
(any pet works, even level 100).
Wear armor enchanted with Growth 5
(Enchanting Level 5), preferably Ender Armor
while you're in The End or Mushroom Armor
during the night.
Applying Growth 5 costs 50 Levels each.
If you still struggle, reforge your
armor to Titanic.
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes
on xMeru's, skyerzz's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it,
get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while wearing Ender Gear.
Kill goblins or open loot chests in
the Crystal Hollows and throw the eggs
until you get a Golden Goblin.
Higher level eggs have higher chances of
spawning, but are also rarer to get.
Ways to obtain:
Craft (Lapis Lazuli Collection 5),
a drop from fishing,
from the Experimentation Table,
drop from Ender Nodes in the End (11-13%).
Optimal tool:
Advanced Gardening Hoe (25 copper)
Make a full plot of carrots (7896 needed)
in The Garden (SkyBlock Level 5)
Get the carrots to plant from The Barn
or from the cave under the mountain in The Hub.
Recommended for this is either Zombie
or Spider Slayer. You will need a total
of 6220 XP for that Slayer.
(T1-T3: 1 each, T4: 13) or
Recommended gear for this is Ender Armor
and a Void Sword or you can rely
on help from friends.
